document_data.name: Mind Blank
document_data.level3e: {{spell table|edition=3e|[[Chastity domain|Chastity]]|9|[[Fate domain|Fate]]|8|[[Mentalism domain|Mentalism]]|8|[[Protection domain]]|8|[[Sorcerer]]|8|[[Trade domain|Trade]]|8|[[Wizard]]|8}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mind blank''''' was a powerful [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that rendered the subject invisible to [[scrying]] and immune to [[magic]] that manipulated the mind and emotions.
document_data.Effects: A single target being was completely safeguarded against all [[:Category:Charm spells|mind-affecting spells]] effects and spells that could detect, affect, or read their thoughts and emotions. It also shielded them from [[divination]] spells and similar effects that could be used to obtain information. Scrying spells that targeted them directly failed. Those that viewed an area, like ''[[arcane eye]]'', would succeed but not register the shielded being. Even mighty spells like ''[[miracle]]'', ''[[limited wish]]'', and ''[[wish]]'' made to gain information about the being or influence their mind were prevented.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Kutson]] in {{Yearlink|-1174}} and was originally called '''''Kutson's mind blank'''''.
